meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unidimensional.
meanings.sent1: The unidimensionalities of the line drawing made it easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: The artist's exploration of unidimensionalities in his work was fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The unidimensionalities of the situation were so clear, it was almost comical.
meanings.sent4: Her explanation of the unidimensionalities of time was like unraveling a mystery.
meanings.sent5: The simplicity of the unidimensionalities in the math problem helped the students grasp the concept easily.

meanings.definition: The concept of existing in only one dimension.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the unidimensionalities of a straight line is fundamental in geometry.
meanings.sent2: The science fiction novel explored the idea of unidimensionalities in a unique way.
meanings.sent3: The unidimensionalities of the character's personality made for an interesting story twist.
meanings.sent4: The unidimensionalities of the plot added depth to the narrative.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting captured the unidimensionalities of space in a captivating manner.
